metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10350 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
The archive_read_format_cab_read_header function inarchive_read_support_format_cab.c in libarchive 3.2.2 allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-read andapplication crash) via a crafted file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10350` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

bsdcpio - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.4
bsdtar - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.4
libarchive13 - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libarchive package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.4').
